answers.answer: Hi -- here is the link to Dr. Lupo's forum:http://www.medhelp.org/forums/Thyroid-Cancer--Nodules--Hyperthyroidism/show/120but feel free to ask your ? here and WELCOME!C~

question: Dr. Lupo,I am a year old female with type  1 diabetes; well controlled.  I recent had a thyroid panel done which showed my TSH to to be low-0.342, T to be high- 4.380, and a normal T4- 0.932.  As a result of my abnormal thyroid panel my doctor ordered a thyroid ultra sound which shows a nodule on my  lower left lobe measuring 1.7 cm isoechoic solid nodule, infereior position with calcifications and somewhat indistinct margins.  the radiologists then goes on to say malinancy cannot  be ruled out based on these images.  The size of my thyroid is otherwise normal.  I would like to get your expert advise on the findings.  I am feeling very anxious and am not scheduled for a FNA until late August.  Also I have a 470 platelet count is there any correlation?Thank You!
title: Robin in Texas
